category.name: Modular Panels and Exhibition Stands Cases and Bags

attributes.attribute: Range of cost effective carry bags to transport Modular panels and Folding panel kits

Standard sizes from stock or custom made;Carry bags are available in <STRONG>Basic</STRONG> and <STRONG>Standard </STRONG>styles;<STRONG>Basic</STRONG> <STRONG>bags</STRONG> are manufactured in 600 denier polypropylene. They have a simple grab handle at the centre of the bag and have a zip which opens at the top only;<STRONG>Standard bags</STRONG> are manufactured in 1200 denier polypropylene. Standard bags have an 'A' frame incorporating a grab handle at the top of the bag. Standard bags also have an adjustable shoulder strap. The zip opens part way down the bag for improved access.;AB107 Pole bag is suitable for carrying 50 off 16mm dia poles or 25 off 25mm dia poles;AB108 Base bag is suitable for carrying 3 off 300mm dia circular bases

Range of cost effective cases to transport Modular panels and Folding panel kits;Standard sizes from stock or custom made;Constructed from polypropylene;Strong and protective outer with foam padded lid and base;AC423 is suitable for carrying 4 off 300mm dia circular bases

Constructed from polypropylene;Available in two sizes;Carries up to 20, 1000mm x 1000mm panels;;2 fixed wheels and 2 steer wheels;Plywood base;AC501 weight 12kg approx;AC502 weight 15kg approx;<FONT color=#ff0000><STRONG>AC501 and AC502 are available to order, allow a lead time of 10 working days approx for delivery</STRONG></FONT>
